Uses of Interface
co.cask.cdap.api.app.Application

  • Packages that use Application 
    Package Description
    co.cask.cdap.api.app
    An Application is a logical grouping of Streams, Datasets, Flows, and other deployable elements.
    co.cask.cdap.api.templates  
    co.cask.cdap.test
    This package contains the public classes for unit tests.

    • Uses of Application in co.cask.cdap.api.app

      Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.app that implement Application 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractApplication
      A support class for Applications which reduces repetition and results in a more readable configuration.

    • Uses of Application in co.cask.cdap.api.templates

      Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.templates that implement Application 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ApplicationTemplate<T>
      An ApplicationTemplate is a special type of Application that can be given a configuration object to create an application instance.
